## HelpBuilderOptions.styles property

Custom styles for help text rendering.

**Signature:**

```typescript
styles?: HelpOptions['styles'];
```

## Remarks

Partial object of `HelpStyles` to override default styling. Available style properties: shortKey, shortDesc, shortSeparator, fullKey, fullDesc, fullSeparator, ellipsis.
